title: Hair Tutorial: Big hair volume with defined waves with Braun
description:
Big hair is sexy! Let’s face it, most celebrities can’t get enough of it. Today we’re showing you how to recreate this prom hairstyle for long hair so you can enjoy being in the spotlight. 
How to hairstyles for long hair with the Braun SensoDryer & Senso

asset.author: Braun
asset.hookText:
Big hair is sexy! Let’s face it, most celebrities can’t get enough of it. Today we’re showing you how to recreate this prom hairstyle for long hair so you can enjoy being in the spotlight. 
How to hairstyles for long hair with the Braun SensoDryer & SensoCare styler: 
Step 1
Section the top of the hair into 3 parts: gather the top section, twist it and fix your hair with a clip on top of the head.
Step 2
Pull portions of the hair over a round brush. Blow air against the strands with the professional narrow nozzle.
Step 3
Backcomb for more volume on top.
Step 4
Finalize the hair style by defining the wave with the SensoCare styler that has smooth edges for easy curling. Just twist the iron over on itself and move it slowly down your hair.

Find more trendy hairstyles:
